title: Social Justice Theories in Education
text:
Globed master | 2023-2024

General information

Syllabus


Assignments



Session 1 | Introduction to the course + What is social justice?
In the first part of the session, the students will be provided with an overview of the course contents and the assessment policies. In the second part, we will discuss the fundamentals of social justice as a key topic of political sociology and its relevance in education.
